description: Leech's tree-labeling problem for n nodes.
references: R. K. Guy, A quarter century of "Monthly" unsolved problems, 1969-1993, Amer Math. Monthly, 100 (1993), 945-949.
R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, Sect. C10.
J. Leech, On the representation of $1,2,\cdots,n$ by differences. J. London Math. Soc. 31 (1956), 160-169.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to trees
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
